report.title: EBMS Site Sections Download Report 2
report.description: Lists saved site sections and their attributes with filtering to integrate with new downloads page on ABLE.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id JOIN locations l2 ON l2.parent_id=l.id LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON l.id = lw.location_id AND lw.deleted = FALSE #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND l.deleted = false AND l2.deleted = false AND (l.public=TRUE OR lw.website_id IS NOT NULL) #filters# #order_by#

param.name: cms_attribute_id
param.description: Attribute used to hold the CMS User ID
param.where: EXISTS (SELECT id FROM location_attribute_values lav WHERE lav.location_id = l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #cms_attribute_id# AND lav.int_value = #cms_user_id# AND lav.deleted=false)

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of site location attribute IDs to include

param.name: loc2attrs
param.description: Comma separated list of section location attribute IDs to include

param.name: indexed_location_list_context
param.join: JOIN locations lcontext on st_intersects(lcontext.boundary_geom, l.centroid_geom) AND lcontext.id IN (#indexed_location_list_context#)
